content: We only know two things about Kaspersky Lab. We know that the service it offers provides protection for all your devices, including your PC, Mac, and Android phone and tablet. We also know that from time to time, Kaspersky Lab drops its prices across the board, and now is one of those times. You can secure Kaspersky Anti Virus , Kaspersky Internet Security , or Kaspersky Total Security at 30% less than list price. This deal isn't around for long, and you'll have to pounce before Feb. 7 to avoid missing out. Kaspersky Lab services protect all of your devices, with just one license to buy. Every device you use can theoretically compromise your security, so Kaspersky Lab covers everything. It also locks, wipes, and locates your devices if they’re lost or stolen. This protection doesn't come at the detriment of your device's performance either; Kaspersky's protection technologies work behind the scenes, meaning performance should not be negatively affected. There are three packages to choose from with the chance to save over £10: Kaspersky Anti Virus — £17.49 (list price £24.99) Kaspersky Internet Security — £24.49 (list price £34.99) Kaspersky Total Security — £27.99 (list price £39.99) Protect yourself against viruses, ransomware, and other threats, without impacting the performance of your devices with Kaspersky Lab. Protect all your devices with 30% off in the Kaspersky Lab UK sale

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Joseph GreenMashable Deals2019-01-31 12:53:38 UTC

We only know two things about Kaspersky Lab. We know that the service it offers provides protection for all your devices, including your PC, Mac, and Android phone and tablet. We also know that from time to time, Kaspersky Lab drops its prices across the board, and now is one of those times.

You can secure Kaspersky Anti Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, or Kaspersky Total Security at 30% less than list price. This deal isn't around for long, and you'll have to pounce before Feb. 7 to avoid missing out.

Kaspersky Lab services protect all of your devices, with just one license to buy. Every device you use can theoretically compromise your security, so Kaspersky Lab covers everything. It also locks, wipes, and locates your devices if they’re lost or stolen. This protection doesn't come at the detriment of your device's performance either; Kaspersky's protection technologies work behind the scenes, meaning performance should not be negatively affected.

There are three packages to choose from with the chance to save over £10:

  • Kaspersky Anti Virus — £17.49 (list price £24.99)

  • Kaspersky Internet Security — £24.49 (list price £34.99)

  • Kaspersky Total Security — £27.99 (list price £39.99)

Protect yourself against viruses, ransomware, and other threats, without impacting the performance of your devices with Kaspersky Lab.




Kaspersky Lab — 30% off Kaspersky Anti Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, and Kaspersky Total Security
See Details
